I love this app. It's designed with the user in mind with it's simple navigation. It also has great features where you can look at your spending habits and check your credit score. I'm also a fan of the freeze feature, saves a lot of stress in those moments where you misplace your card, or just have been overspending lol.
So far, no complaints with app. Customer service is always courteous and helpful. Overall I've been very happy with Discover. I would say, best of all financial institutions I deal with.
